why: Moving with control and awareness improves outcomes more than sheer volume.

slides.title: Movement Quality
slides.content: Quality beats quantity: focus on control, awareness, and intention.

slides.title: Key Elements
slides.content: Neutral stack; smooth tempo; pain‑free range; steady breath.

slides.title: Common Pitfalls
slides.content: Racing reps; holding breath; chasing soreness instead of control.

slides.title: Myth vs Fact
slides.content: Myth: More reps = better. Fact: Better reps = better.

slides.title: Try this today
slides.content: Film one set; score control 1–5; repeat set slower with steadier breath.
